Parameters: boolean: when true a background is drawn for each emoji that is replaced
setEmojiSpanIndicatorEnabled(boolean).Description: Determines whether a background will be drawn for the emojis that are found and replaced by EmojiCompat. Should be used only for debugging purposes. The indicator color can be set using @B_android#support#text#emoji#EmojiCompat#Config#setEmojiSpanIndicatorColor_E@.

setEmojiSpanIndicatorColor(int).Description: Sets the color used as emoji span indicator. The default value is @B_android#graphics#Color#GREEN_E@.

Parameters: boolean: replace all emojis found with EmojiSpans
setReplaceAll(boolean).Description: Determines whether EmojiCompat should replace all the emojis it finds with the EmojiSpans. By default EmojiCompat tries its best to understand if the system already can render an emoji and do not replace those emojis.

ClassDesc: Configuration class for EmojiCompat. Changes to the values will be ignored after @B_android#support#text#emoji#EmojiCompat#init_E@ is called.
